main.name: Luigi Matias
main.description: I am pretty comfortable on the Front-End side but also have some experience in the Back-End and learning more. My goal is to be a Full-Stack Developer. I am a student for a life and I am always looking for continous improvement.
main.bio: Yes, I was named after a video game character. I also do love playing video games but I also love to stay active by playing basketball, going hiking, and riding my mountain bike.
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: I am more comfortable with Front-End, I have worked in some Back-End. Long term goal I want to be a Full-Stack

education.description: NOVA, helped me figure out what I really wanted out of the degree and overtime help me grow as a person. Also saved me a lot of money

work.title: Web Developer Jr
work.description: I am currently working full time for CorporateZen as a junior developer. I help the company with various task of bug fixes on the Front-End, updating a file/stylesheet or deleting a bad sign up in the database by using MySQL
